gobblin.util.recordcount

Class IngestionRecordCountProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.util.RecordCountProvider
      • gobblin.util.recordcount.IngestionRecordCountProvider

  • public class IngestionRecordCountProvider
extends RecordCountProvider
    Implementation of RecordCountProvider, which provides record count from file path. The file path should follow the pattern: {Filename}.{RecordCount}.{Extension}. For example, given a file path: "/a/b/c/file.123.avro", the record count will be 123.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      IngestionRecordCountProvider() 

    • Method Summary

      static String constructFilePath(String oldFilePath, long recordCounts)
      Construct a new file path by appending record count to the filename of the given file path, separated by SEPARATOR.
      long getRecordCount(Path filepath)
      The record count should be the last component before the filename extension.

      • IngestionRecordCountProvider

    • Method Detail

      • constructFilePath

        public static String constructFilePath(String oldFilePath,
                                       long recordCounts)
        Construct a new file path by appending record count to the filename of the given file path, separated by SEPARATOR. For example, given path: "/a/b/c/file.avro" and record count: 123, the new path returned will be: "/a/b/c/file.123.avro"

      • getRecordCount

        public long getRecordCount(Path filepath)
        The record count should be the last component before the filename extension.
        Specified by:
        getRecordCount in class RecordCountProvider
